review: I'm very happy with this little device, which has replaced my Wifi-enabled BluRay player as the preferred method for streaming to my television.  It was very easy to set up and I like the fact that it has own remote control so I don't have to install yet another app on my phone.  I have also found it to be more reliable than the Chromecast, which frequently loses its connection despite the fact my router is within 5 feet of my TV.  This may have something to do with the fact that I live in a large apartment building surrounded by wireless networks, but so far it has not been a problem for the Fire TV Stick.
author: Katherine
